kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Average ping over ${RECEIVED}/${SENT} packets is ${AVG PING}ms
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: ${AVG PING}ms is above ${MAX AVG PING}ms threshold.
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: No Operation
kw.doc: Does absolutely nothing.

kw.name: Pass Execution
kw.doc: Skips rest of the current test, setup, or teardown with PASS status.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
